Breadth-First.Explanation: General introductory plan to gather clues without a specific hypothesis
Beginning broad observation of the image elements
Listing architectural and man-made features as general clues
Listing text and signage clues broadly
Listing character/mascot observations as additional clues
Describing overall setting context to build impression
Generating multiple location hypotheses from gathered clues

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent focus on a single specific location hypothesis

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from considering multiple possible locations to committing to and refining a single hypothesis
